sub_title: Global Geoscience Advisor, RTS, Baker Hughes, Dubai
summary:
I am a Senior Geoscientist with 17 years of subsurface experience covering a range of exploration and development subsurface roles based in the Netherlands, UAE, Kuwait, and Egypt. I have been involved in E&P projects spanning the complete field cycle from greenfield development of multi-TCF dry gas fields through to a billion barrel mature oil field rehabilitation projects. My technical experience covers all play-types in a range of basin settings worldwide. Experienced in both Geology and Geophysics with broad experience in seismic interpretation, prospect generation and reservoir characterization. I have particular expertise in the construction and maintenance of integrated 3D reservoir models used for field development, reservoir management and production forecasting for business planning purposes. This expertise has been developed through my participation in delivering high technical quality asset projects through to course tuition and mentoring. My original education provided with the background to pursue a Geoscience career - I have enhanced this in my spare time by recently studding a master's in petroleum engineering at Heriot Watt. This provides me with a more integrated geoscience background and enables me to provide greater value to an asset business.

Specialties: 
3D Reservoir Modelling
Seismic Interpretation
Prospects generation
Exploration studies
Integrating reservoir characterisation 
Assets evaluation
Reserve booking
Carbonates & Clastics
Unconventional Carbonates
Naturally fractured reservoirs
Field development planning

profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist

profile_positions.description: I worked as a consultant for Baker Hughes Dubai. Working on an integrated field development study for KOC, handling a range of geological activities related to 3D reservoir modelling and field development. Provides Geoscience leadership for G&G staff. Responsible for the delivery and QA/QC of all subsurface technical work. Arrange client presentations. Participate in business development efforts writing technical proposals in accordance with Company Policies, Procedures and Technical Work Practices.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist/Geomodeller

profile_positions.description: I worked as a consultant in a long-term project in Kuwait. handling a range of geological activities related to field development and near field exploration for one of KOC green fields in North Kuwait . Construct and update the 3D geological models of producing and undeveloped Lower Cretaceous Burgan and Mauddud reservoirs. Burgan is a clastics tidal dominated deltaic sandstone reservoir while Mauddud is a challenging unconventional Carbonate reservoir where we drill long horizontal wells to maximize reservoir exposure and apply a multistage frac with acid stimulation to improve the recovery. I am also handling the exploration and appraisal activities within the field doing seismic interpretation, prospects generation, detailed prospect mapping, risking, probabilistic resource determination, and portfolio ranking.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist (Consultant)

profile_positions.description: I was hired as a consultant in the subsurface team where I completed two projects. My first assignment was to come up with a new independent seismic interpretation for A15 gas field in the North Sea Dutch sector where we had a multi stacked layered reservoirs and the deeper ones were the most challenging because of the gas sagging effect which made the interpretation quite challenging as well as the time to depth conversion. After completing the Seismic interpretation, I constructed a new 3D static model for the interpreted reservoirs in order to estimate the in-place resources and assess the reservoir uncertainties. My second project was B10 shallow gas fields. Where I have done a complete review and assessment of the in-place resources to see if it will pass the minimum economic cutoffs to develop that field which found to be marginal at the time because of low gas prices. The assessment started with an extensive QA/QC of the G&G and PP data available and building a new integrated 3D static model which has been used for dynamic simulation and helped in making the investment decision.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist

profile_positions.description:
I worked as a senior geoscientist in multiple development and exploration projects, including reserves estimate and reserve booking exercise for MOL 60-64 for a Nigerian client. 3D static model review and update of a giant carbonate field (Kirkuk field, Kurdistan). Provide G&G input to production optimization and field development planning project. Apart from technical work, I mentored young staff as well as writing technical reports and proposals.
I have been assigned as a project manager to lead a multi-disciplinary team in one of the major projects in Niger Delta. I was responsible for management, execution and delivery of the project on-time and according to company quality control standard. Being the liaison with the customer during the project. have responsibilities to keep projects on track and focused on objectives. I also shared technical tasks with the team as well as non-technical tasks like invoicing, time keeping, and budget control.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist/ Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Worked on several development and exploration mega projects throughout the world, Where I developed a Strong background in both carbonate and clastic reservoirs characterization, naturally fractured reservoirs, and field development planning. I Worked as a consultant for a number of Roxar clients in a variety of tectonic settings, basins, and large & complex fields such as: KSA (Ghawar field), UAE (Umm Shaif, Zakum, Sarb, Nasr, Umm Lulu, Bu Hasa, Bida Al Qemzan, Falah). Kurdistan (Kirkuk field, Akri Bijeel). Iran(Gachsaran and Rag-e Sefid Asmari reservoir. Pakistan (Makori East field). India (Mangala field). Where I developed, directed and participated in geological reservoir studies aimed at constructing and/or improving geological 3D static models, produced appropriate upscaled models for reservoir simulation, calculated volumetrics of hydrocarbon in place with uncertainties, and defined data acquisition programs allowing the reduction of these uncertainties. Trained and supervised junior geology staff in 3D modelling studies, and in design-and steer-development projects. I presented products and project results to clients, provided software support, and conducted technical training courses.
profile_positions.title: Senior Geoscientist/Geomodeller

profile_positions.description: I worked as a Senior Geoscientist in Nile Delta regional team where I performed various tasks, especially seismic interpretation, prospect evaluation, Reserves Estimation, and Risking. The most significant contribution however was, I comprehensively illustrated the nature and variation of the seismic phase and polarity in the study area, and its implications on the AVO response. I found out at that many seismic data sets/vintages were having a wrong polarity which indeed affects the AVO response by giving a false misleading interpretation of the data available. By fixing it up to the correct polarity/phase, many prospects which were considered water bearing were suddenly have a positive AVO response and hence lower associated risk. That was a great achievement which I am still proud of and I believe it was an unforgettable contribution to my company and for their future success.
